name: Drugtopia
description:
A game done in the Ludum Dare Jam at Enti-UB by: 

- Marc Company - Programer

- Pol Jandula - Artist

- Pere Massaguer - Programer

- Marc Saló @kayranisArt - Artist

- Sergi Sin @Sergi_sin - Game Designer / Producer

Our game consist on taking all the drugs you can... Will you resist their effects???
